title: North East Line service disruption due to train fault

title_translations.zh-Hans: 东北线因列车故障导致服务中断
title_translations.ms: Gangguan perkhidmatan Laluan Timur Laut kerana kerosakan kereta api
title_translations.ta: வடகிழக்கு வழித்தடத்தில் ரயில் பழுது காரணமாக சேவை தடை

updates.text: 12/09, 6.18pm: NEL svc has resumed. We are sorry for the inconvenience caused.
12/09 6.02pm: NEL svc is delayed due to a train fault at Boon Keng NE9. Additional travel time of abt 10 mins may be expected.
